candidates.title: In Pictures: Stunning sunrise around Scotland to start the week
candidates.content:
A stunning sunrise brightened the skies above Scotland on Monday morning.
Impressive photographs have been shared on social media and by BBC Weather Watchers.
The pink and orange rises were captured in places including Aberdeen, Aberdeenshire, Angus, Fife, the Highlands and the Scottish Borders.
All photos are subject to copyright.
